Can someone tell me how to burn this to a disc so it works after download

@honeybear26 Assuming this actually turns up. You need to have a compatible ihas drive along with the modified firmware called burnermax. This allows for a proper burn of an xgd3 title without random disk error issues while playing. Run the game iso through a program called abgx360 and finally burn the game with Imgburn. It is recommended to use verbatim dl for burning. Hope this helps.
@honeybear shit my bad, im so hyped for the 360 version that i did not realize your asking directions for ps3. But ya idk, google it...
